name: Truant Devourer
movement: average speed of 40 feet and ability to teleport
description: The Truant Devourer is a formidable undead entity that exudes dark intent, capable of becoming invisible and summoning ghostly skeletal claws to restrain and damage foes.
memorable: Its ability to reduce opponents' maximum hit points with Life Drain makes it a particularly deadly foe.
goals: Hunt and eliminate those deemed heretics by its creator deity.
relations: May serve or be associated with other undead or dark religious figures.
environment: Often found in areas of conflict or places where its creator deity's influence is strong.
strengths: Possesses magic resistance and the ability to detect and track heretics effectively.
weaknesses: Susceptible to radiant damage, and magic attacks that exceed its resistances can be particularly effective.
attacks: Can make multiple melee attacks with its Devourer’s Cleaver or cast Necrotic Bolt, inflicting necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Life Drain allows it to inflict necrotic damage and reduce maximum hit points of its target.
senses: Has a heightened passive Perception of 18, enhancing its awareness.
skills: Demonstrates proficiency in perception, providing an edge in detecting threats.
additional_information: Can become invisible until it attacks or uses certain abilities.
Can teleport short distances to reposition during combat.
Resistant to being turned by clerics due to its Turn Resistance.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep as part of its Undead Nature.
Can summon grasping claws to restrain and damage multiple foes at once.
test_queries: monster that reduces maximum hit points
